net.canarymod.api

Interface PathFinder


  • public interface PathFinder
    Path Finder
    Author:
    Aaron (somners)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setPathSearchRange(float range)
      Set the max range this pathfinder will find a path to.
      boolean setPathToBlock(Block block)
      Sets the entity on a path to the given block.
      boolean setPathToEntity(Entity entity)
      Sets the entity on a path to the given entity.
      boolean setPathToLocation(Location location)
      Sets the entity on a path to the given location.
      boolean setPathToXYZ(double x, double y, double z, World world)
      Sets a entity on path to the Given points
      void setSpeed(float speed)
      Set the speed of this mob, it should be between 0.0F and 1.0F
      NOTE: 1.0F is really really fast.

    • Method Detail

      • setPathToXYZ

        boolean setPathToXYZ(double x,
                     double y,
                     double z,
                     World world)
        Sets a entity on path to the Given points
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        z - z coordinate
        world - world
        Returns:
        true if the path was set, false if failed

      • setPathToLocation

        boolean setPathToLocation(Location location)
        Sets the entity on a path to the given location.
        Parameters:
        location - location to navigate to
        Returns:
        true if the path was set, false if failed

      • setPathToEntity

        boolean setPathToEntity(Entity entity)
        Sets the entity on a path to the given entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - entity to navigate to
        Returns:
        true if the path was set, false if failed

      • setPathToBlock

        boolean setPathToBlock(Block block)
        Sets the entity on a path to the given block.
        Parameters:
        block - block to navigate to
        Returns:
        true if the path was set, false if failed

      • setSpeed

        void setSpeed(float speed)
        Set the speed of this mob, it should be between 0.0F and 1.0F
        NOTE: 1.0F is really really fast.
        Parameters:
        speed - speed for this mob to walk.

      • setPathSearchRange

        void setPathSearchRange(float range)
        Set the max range this pathfinder will find a path to. default is 25.
        Parameters:
        range - the float range
